data.title: Humboldt County, CA - Official Website
data.meta_description: Current unsolved homicide and missing persons cases for the Humboldt County Sheriff's Office. If you have information about a case, please call 707-445-7251.
data.text:
Name: Hans Martin Lippuner

Case Number: 201805672

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 7/17/1959

City of Residency: McKinleyville, CA

Synopsis: On November 1, 2018, Hans Lippuner was reported missing to the Humboldt County Sheriff’s Office. He was last seen by his housemates on October 16, 2018 in the Dows Prairie area. A white Ford Econoline van associated with Lippuner was located abandoned in Trinity County near Del Loma and was recovered by law enforcement in August of 2019. Lippuner has not been seen since his disappearance and is missing under suspicious circumstances.

Resources: Lippuner Missing Person Flyer

Name: Salvatore Riccobono IV

Case Number: 201801945

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 7/7/1987

City of Residency: Antioch, CA

Synopsis: On April 23, 2018, at about 5:03 a.m., deputies were dispatched to U.S. Highway 101 near Salmon Creek for the report of a subject struck by a vehicle. It was later determined that the victim, Salvatore Riccobono was deceased prior to the traffic collision and his death was determined to be a homicide.

Resources: Riccobono Investigation Press Release

Name: Mark Charles Burleigh

Case Number: 201800741

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 12/25/1984

City of Residency: Miranda, CA / Transient

Synopsis: On February 13, 2018, Mark Burleigh was reported missing to the Humboldt County Sheriff’s Office. He was last seen by a family member on the morning of September 15, 2017, in the Alderpoint area. Burleigh is missing under suspicious circumstances.

Name: Saul Perez Pacheco

Case Number: 201800009

Race: Hispanic

Sex: Male

DOB: 7/6/1989

City of Residency: Unknown

Synopsis: On January 1, 2018, at about 5 a.m., deputies were dispatched to Gerald Phelps Hospital in Garberville for a gunshot victim. The victim, Saul Pacheco, succumbed to his injuries at the hospital.

Resources: Pacheco Investigation Press Release 1, Pacheco Investigation Update

Name: Matthew Thomas Dix

Case Number: 201705967

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 9/2/1990

City of Residency: Manila, CA

Synopsis: On December 2, 2017, at about 3 a.m., Matthew Dix was located deceased sitting in his vehicle parked in the driveway outside of his residence in Manila.

Resources: Dix Investigation Press Release 1, Dix Investigation Update

Name: Lawrence O’Connor

Case Number: 201604450

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 6/11/1966

City of Residency: Eureka, CA

Synopsis: On September 5, 2016, Lawrence O’Connor and David Sims were located deceased at a rural property in Hyampom.Their deaths were determined to be a double homicide.

Name: David Michael Sims

Also Known As: "Skids"

Case Number: 201604450

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 12/19/1968

City of Residency: Samoa, CA

Synopsis: On September 5, 2016, David Sims and Lawrence O’Connor were located deceased at a rural property in Hyampom.Their deaths were determined to be a double homicide.

Name: Stephanie Gawboy

Case Number: 201604171

Race: White

Sex: Female

DOB: 2/24/1964

City of Residency: Redway, CA

Synopsis: On August 17, 2016 at about 9:30 a.m.,Stephanie Gawboy was located deceased inside of a residence on the 100 block of Redway Drive in Redway.

Name: Dana N Hudson

Case Number: 201604099

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 2/13/1972

City of Residency: Blue Lake, CA

Synopsis: On August 12, 2016, at about 11:59 a.m., deputies were dispatched Highway 299 Mile Marker 21 for the report of a robbery that had just occurred. The victim, Dana Hudson, later succumbed to his injuries sustained during the robbery. The incident was later determined to have actually occurred on Sabretooth Road.

Name: Brials Mccutcheon

Case Number: 201604001

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 9/20/1974

City of Residency: Eureka, CA

Synopsis: On Aug. 6, 2016, at about 5:42 p.m., Humboldt County Sheriff’s deputies were dispatched to the 4300 block of Crestview Drive in Eureka for the report of a possible suicide. Deputies arrived on scene and located Brials Mccutcheon deceased inside of his vehicle. His death was later determined to be a homicide.

Resources: Mccutcheon Investigation Press Release

Name: Arthur Ruiz

Case Number: 201600470

Race: Native American

Sex: Male

DOB: 10/20/1973

City of Residency: Hoopa, CA

Synopsis: Arthur Ruiz was reported missing on Jan. 12, 2016 by family members. Ruiz’s remains were located on Jan. 28, 2016 in the area of Redwood Grove Road in Hoopa.

Name: Hugh Wray Duggins

Case Number: 201600320

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 6/9/1944

City of Residency: Alderpoint, CA

Synopsis: On January 22, 2016, Hugh Duggins was located deceased several feet down an embankment off of Alderpoint Road near Dyerville Loop Road. Duggins was last seen alive by friends on January 15, 2016. Duggins’ death has been ruled suspicious.

Name: John (aka “Johnny”) Henry Deleon

Case Number: 201501307

Race: Hispanic

Sex: Male

DOB: 5/17/1988

City of Residency: San Jose, CA

Synopsis: John Deleon was reported missing on October 30, 2014 by family members. On March 22, 2015 Deleon’s remains were located in a remote area near Baird Road in Hoopa. n ruled suspicious.

Name: Robert James Flaherty

Case Number: 201404875

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 3/29/1984

Synopsis: Robert Flaherty was reported missing in July of 2014 by family members. On Oct. 14, 2014 Flaherty was located deceased at a camp in a wooded area off Redwood Drive in Garberville Name: Luis Edwardo Raya

Case Number: 201403732

Also Known As: Luis Edwardo Garcia Raya, “Perico”

Race: Hispanic

Sex: Male

DOB: 2/28/1983

City of Residency: Arcata, CA

Synopsis: Luis Raya was last seen on June 14, 2014 at about 8:30 p.m. at his home in Arcata by family members. Raya was no longer at the home when family members returned to the residence later that evening. Raya reportedly worked at a marijuana farm in Miranda and was possibly seen in June or July of 2014 in the Southern Humboldt area. On August 10, 2014, skeletal remains belonging to Raya were discovered at Cuneo Creek State Park near Bull Creek.Name: Scott William Johnson

Case Number: 201403367

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 9/2/1956

City of Residency: Alderpoint, CA

Synopsis: On July 21, 2014, 7 p.m., Scott Johnson was reportedly searching for a known homicide suspect in the Rancho Sequoia area when he was shot and killed by an unknown person(s). Johnson was located deceased in the roadway in the Willow Lane area of Rancho Sequoia Drive. Name: Jeffrey Keith Joseph

Case Number: 201403130

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 2/4/1969

City of Residency: New Orleans, LA

Synopsis: On July 8, 2014, Jeffrey Joseph was reported missing to the Humboldt County Sheriff’s Office following a road trip to Humboldt County to purchase a large amount of marijuana. Joseph last contacted family and friends via cellphone in the late morning of June 21, 2014. Joseph’s last known location is somewhere west of Redding, possibly Willow Creek. Joseph was last known to be driving a green 1998 Toyota Rav 4 with a Louisiana license plate, at the time he went missing.

Resources: Jeffrey Joseph Missing Person Flyer Name: Sheila Franks

Case Number: 201401174

Race: White

Sex: Female

DOB: 7/19/1976

City of Residency: Fortuna, CA

Synopsis: Sheila Franks was reported missing on March 13, 2014 by a family member. On June 10, 2019, skeletal remains were located at Crab Park in Loleta. DNA analysis confirmed that the remains belonged to Franks.

Resources: Franks Missing Person Flyer

Name: Danielle Nicole Brooks

Case Number: 201400805

Also Known As: Danielle Nicole Bertolini

Race: White

Sex: Female

DOB: 3/6/1990

City of Residency: Fortuna, CA

Synopsis: Danielle Brooks was reported missing to the Fortuna Police Department on February 19, 2014 by family members. Danielle was last seen around February 9, 2014 in the Swains Flat area. On March 9, 2015, skeletal remains believed to belong to Brooks were located in the Eel River bed near Howe Creek in Ferndale.

Name: Garret Alan Rodriguez

Case Number: 201302060

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 5/2/1983

City of Residency: San Diego, CA

Synopsis: Garret Rodriguez was reported missing by a family member on April 25, 2013. Garrett was believed to be working on a marijuana farm in Southern Humboldt County. Garret’s body was located in a shallow grave on a rural property in Southern Humboldt on December 1, 2013.

Name: Edward Burton Jensen Jr.

Case Number: 201104203

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 12/9/1956

City of Residency: Redway, CA

Synopsis: Edward Jensen was reported missing on April 28, 2011 by a family member. Jensen was last seen around April 14, 2011, when he reportedly walked away from a rural property located in the Larabee Creek Sub-Division in Blocksburg after a brief verbal argument with a subject on the property. On July 28, 2011, Jensen’s remains were located on the Eel River bar in Redcrest.

Name: Sumi Gail Juan

Case Number: 201007024

Race: Native American

Sex: Female

DOB: 11/2/1977

City of Residency: Hoopa, CA

Synopsis: Sumi Juan was reported missing to the Humboldt County Sheriff’s Office on October 29, 2010. She was last seen by family members in early October or September 2010 at Hoopa Elementary School. Juan has not been seen since her disappearance and is missing under suspicious circumstances.

Resources: Sumi Juan Case Press Releases

Name: Ross Carson Cunningham

Case Number: 199904305

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 7/4/1963

City of Residency: Loleta, CA

Synopsis: Ross Carson Cunningham was located deceased in his bed on May 8, 1999 at his residence on the 2300 block of Hookton Drive in Loleta. Cunningham’s manner of death appears to be homicide.

Name: Tawnya Marie Leavitt

Case Number: 199800650

Race: White

Sex: Female

DOB: 5/12/1982

City of Residency: Eureka, CA

Synopsis: On February 1, 1998, Tawnya Leavitt was located deceased in the grassy area off of the north end of the Samoa Airstrip by Coast Guard crews training in the area.

Name: Steven M. Carracciolo

Case Number: 199707434

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 7/27/1971

City of Residency: Rockville, NY

Synopsis: Steven Carracciolo was reported missing out of New York State. Caracciolo, an avid bicyclist, reportedly began a cross-country road trip and picked up hitchhikers along the way. On November 13, 1997, skeletal remains were located along the Eel River near the Pepperwood Summer Bridge by a CDC crew working in the area. DNA analysis determined the remains belonged to Caracciolo. Caracciolo’s death has been determined to be a homicide. He is believed to have been murdered sometime during the night in early October.Name: Sandra Kay Albiani

Case Number: 199703626

Race: White

Sex: Female

DOB: 5/4/1952

City of Residency: Scotia, CA

Synopsis: Sandra Albiani was working as a security guard at the Pacific Lumber Company on June 9, 1997 when she went missing during her shift, sometime in the early morning hours. Albiani’s body was discovered later that afternoon buried on the property.

Name: Eric Scott Day

Case Number: 199702426

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 7/13/1971

City of Residency: Scotia, CA

Synopsis: Eric Day was last seen in Rio Dell on/around February 17, 1997. Day reportedly had a broken leg and was using crutches prior to his disappearance. Day reportedly had acquaintances in the Stafford area and may have been in the Southern Humboldt area in the days surrounding his disappearance.Name: Keith Lynn Abbey Jr.

Also Known As: Bud

Case Number: 199305414

Race: White

Sex: Male

Age at Death: 32

City of Residency: Transient

Synopsis: On August 16, 1993, Keith Lynn Abbey was found deceased on the North Jetty Beach near Samoa. His death has been determined to be a homicide.Name: John Wyatt Jameton

Case Number: 199305192

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 9/18/1972

City of Residency: Garberville, CA

Synopsis: On August 5, 1993, John Jameton was found deceased on Overpack Grove Road in the Richardson Grove area. His death has been determined to be a homicide.Name: John Gregory Potter

Case Number: 199302464

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 4/5/1954

City of Residency: Unknown

Synopsis: John Gregory Potter was discovered missing from a residence in Whitethorn on March 27, 1993. On April 13, 1993, Potter was located deceased in the Mattole River near Whitethorn.

Resources: Potter Case Press Releases

Name: Curtis Lee Ellis

Case Number: 199107762

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 4/7/1960

City of Residency: Eureka, CA

Synopsis: Curtis Lee Elis was reported missing to the Eureka Police Department on August 8, 1990. Ellis was last seen in late February 1990 and was reportedly leaving to visit Texas. Skeletal remains identified as belonging to Ellis were located on December 29, 1992, by a tourist in the area of the Avenue of the Giants near Myers Flat. Ellis’ cause of death is unknown and his death is considered suspicious.

Resources:Ellis Case Press ReleasesName: Andrea Jerri White

Also Known As: Chick White

Case Number: 199104746

Race: Native American

Sex: Female

DOB: 11/14/1968

City of Residency: Hoopa, CA

Synopsis: Andrea “Chick” White was last seen on July 31, 1991 at about 1:30 p.m. hitchhiking along Highway 299 eastbound, east of Blue Lake. Investigative information indicates that White may have received a ride from that location in a white over green 1964 Chevy Impala four-door with mud/snow tires on the rear.

Resources:White Case Press Releases.Name: Gerrold Robin Maniaci

Case Number: 199005189

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 11/17/1959

City of Residency: Garberville, CA

Synopsis: Gerrold Maniaci was reported missing by a family member on July 23, 1990. He was reportedly last seen on June 3, 1990 in Phillipsville.Name: Dottie Jean Willis

Case Number: 199004346

Race: White

Sex: Female

DOB: 5/12/1953

City of Residency: Eureka, CA

Synopsis: On June 21, 1990, Dottie Willis was found deceased at the north end of Heindon Road near Arcata. Her death has been determined to be a homicide.Name: Robert Monroe Alexander

Case Number: 199000693

Race: White

Sex: Male

DOB: 6/12/1925

City of Residency: Westhaven, CA

Synopsis: On January 22, 1990, Robert Alexander was reported missing to the Humboldt County Sheriff’s Office. As part of their investigation, deputies searched a property associated with Alexander on the 300 block of Old Wagon Road. Alexander’s remains were located buried on the property on January 24, 1990.
